summary: Completed comprehensive testing of MGNREGA District Performance Dashboard. All backend APIs (100% success rate) and frontend features are working excellently. Multi-language support, mobile responsiveness, and data visualization are all functioning as expected.
passed_tests: All 10 backend API endpoints (states, districts, performance, translations)
Homepage loads with proper styling and layout
State and district selection dropdowns work correctly
Performance metrics cards (Active Workers, Person Days, Average Wage, Works Completed)
Progress bars with correct percentages and color coding
Percentage change indicators with trend icons
Multi-language support (English, Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, Bengali)
Touch targets meet mobile accessibility standards (44px minimum)
